message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and personal life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800,000. This is a competitive price considering its value to you is $1,000,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Alice, thank you for the offer. $800,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value to me and your desired selling price. Let's see if we can make this deal work.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to save as much as possible, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $750,000. This is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to you and my desired selling price.
